nodes.text: Old Town was one of the main cities on Sakuub. It was located several days' hiking time away from the Sky Temple of Karsol.
Old Town contained a run-down spaceport, at least one hotel, a sector-famous market, and Shuku's Fine Fungi, which was located at the intersection of High Street and River Way.
In 44 ABY, Jaina Solo and Jagged Fel honeymooned there.
